form.name: form1

div.span: Important Information Regarding Closing of Schools

span.style: color: #333333; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 700; text-align: center; background-color: #ffffff

p.span: Pursuant to the latest Executive Order from the Governor, all schools in New York State will remain closed until May 15.
